attributes.action: Justify the cost of the 2012 olympic games against global poverty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can a cost of between 2.3 and 9 billion pounds for a couple of weeks of sport be justified when millions of people are starving all over the world. Justify why this money isn't better spent helping those people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
